subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The former Iranian star Ali Daei was hired as the men’s national team coach and will try to lead Iran to a second straight appearance in the World Cup. In the last two months, the Iran soccer federation announced the hiring of at least two foreign coaches, including Arthur George of Portugal and Javier Clemente of Spain. Neither reached a final agreement.
